removed "Popular culture" section, no real content

added models available from italian providers

merged images of models with Wikitable

/* Daytona */ adding new code-name Daytona/Amazon aka 8300
tighted up opening two paragraphs, eliminated some duplicated and repetition, removed references to topics e.g. e62, palm not appropriate for introductory paragraphs
/* Popular culture */ March 2005, the model was said to have slapped assistant Amanda Brack and beaten her around the head with a BlackBerry hand-held personal organiser.
/* External links */ removing linkcruft, see [[WP:NOT]], namely wikipedia is not merely a collection of links. use google.
/* BlackBerry Partner Solutions */ wooooa there original research! down boy!
/* Third party software */ space, and these dont need to be wikilinked
Palm O/S is not yet compatible with BlackBerry Connect
/* Popular culture */ agree -- trio-esque is not blackberry-esque
Dialed In has just joined the BlackBerry Alliance Program
added references to CrackBerry - new word of the year, and external link to CrackBerry.com community website
/* Phones with BlackBerry */ Correct Nokia E61
